name: Witches' Brewery
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 95: Bad Cooking.

Play as a witch brewing potions for customers. Left click to move. Click on chests to grab ingredients, click on the cauldron to throw ingredients in. Follow the recipe on the upper right of the screen.

The web build looks significantly worse than the desktop one (Didn't know that linear color space isn't available on web builds).

This is my first 3D game, so there's plenty of stuff that I didn't get to (Animations and actual textures come to mind). Picking up the ingredients can also be a little finicky sometimes.

Music used:

Medieval: King's Feast by RandomMind

Bossa Nova by Joth
